description:
Yes! He is 19! Yeah, I know, he looks a bit more mature than that.
When I first got Gabriel's sample photos, I could see he had lots of natural body hair that was trimmed up and would totally rock once it was grown out a bit. Fortunately, he had already given up on his quest to de-hair himself and showed up naturally furry.
Gabriel is a college kid, just trying to get by. He's loves to be dominated by women, and for someone who is 19, you can tell he has experimented pretty far down the bondage/slave road. It makes me wonder if being dominated by a dude would be something he could get into as well.
I've been on hiatus on the Edge videos, but I should get the chair out just for him. He would rock and be totally in to it.
If not, I will see if I can get him to play with a dude!
title: Gabriel Imus - Solo
